org.lenskit.knn.user

Class UserVectorSimilarity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.knn.user.UserVectorSimilarity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, UserSimilarity

    @Shareable
public class UserVectorSimilarity
extends Object
implements UserSimilarity, Serializable

    Implementation of UserSimilarity that delegates to a vector similarity.

    Since:
    0.11
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • similarity

        public double similarity(long i1,
                         SparseVector v1,
                         long i2,
                         SparseVector v2)
        Description copied from interface: UserSimilarity

        Compute the similarity between two users.

        Specified by:
        similarity in interface UserSimilarity
        Parameters:
        i1 - The first user ID.
        v1 - The first user vector.
        i2 - The second user ID.
        v2 - The second user vector.
        Returns:
        The similarity between the two users, in the range [0,1].

      • isSymmetric

        public boolean isSymmetric()
        Description copied from interface: UserSimilarity

        Query whether this similarity is symmetric.

        Warning: At present, asymmetric similarity functions may not produce correct results. In practice, this is not a problem, as most similarity functions are symmetric. Watch issue 151 for updates on this issue.

        Specified by:
        isSymmetric in interface UserSimilarity
        Returns:
        true if the similarity function is symmetric.
        See Also:
        VectorSimilarity.isSymmetric()
